name: Carlo Rovelli
tagline: Physicist exploring quantum gravity, time, and the nature of reality
bio:
Carlo Rovelli is a theoretical physicist working on quantum gravity—attempting to reconcile quantum mechanics with general relativity. He's one of the founders of loop quantum gravity, an approach that suggests space itself is made of discrete quanta rather than being continuous.

Rovelli has become known not just for technical physics but for lyrical, accessible writing about science and reality. His books blend rigorous physics with philosophical reflection and poetic sensibility, making fundamental physics accessible without oversimplification. He writes about time, space, consciousness, and what physics tells us about existence.

What makes Rovelli distinctive is his integration of scientific rigor with humanistic breadth—he reads philosophy, discusses ancient atomists alongside quantum field theory, and maintains wonder while pursuing precision.

perspective.stance: Physics reveals a reality far stranger than common sense suggests; understanding requires both technical mastery and philosophical reflection
